query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
1 Io dico, seguitando, ch’assai prima 2 che noi fossimo al piè de l’alta torre, 3 li occhi nostri n’andar suso a la cima
query.error: **English:** 1 I say, continuing, that long before 2 we were at the foot of the high tower, 3 our eyes went up to the top
query.result: 1 Aham bruve, anucharan, yatkālam bahu pūrvam 2 asmābhiḥ na upasthitaḥ āsīt uttungaḥ śikharasya mūlaḥ, 3 asmākam netrāṇi gatāni ūrdhvam śikharaṃ prati

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
4 per due fiammette che i vedemmo porre, 5 e un’altra da lungi render cenno, 6 tanto ch’a pena il potea l’occhio tòrre.
query.error: **English:** 4 because of two flames that we saw placed there, 5 and another from afar giving a signal, 6 so much so that the piercing eye could barely make it out.
query.result: 4 dvābhyām jvālābhyām yāḥ asmābhiḥ dṛṣṭāḥ sthāpitāḥ tatra, 5 anyā ca dūrāt pratyuttaram dadatī saṃjñām, 6 yāvat kiñcid eva śaknoti tām gṛhṇītuṃ cakṣuḥ tīkṣṇam.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
7 E io mi volsi al mar di tutto ’l senno; 8 dissi: «Questo che dice? e che risponde 9 quell’ altro foco? e chi son quei che ’l fenno?».
query.error: **English:** 7 And I turned to the sea of all wisdom; 8 I said: "What does this one say? and what does 9 that other fire answer? and who are those who made it?"

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
10 Ed elli a me: «Su per le sucide onde 11 già scorgere puoi quello che s’aspetta, 12 se ’l fummo del pantan nol ti nasconde».
query.error: **English:** 10 And they to me: "Up over the murky waves 11 you can already make out what is awaited, 12 if the smoke of the marsh does not hide it from you."
query.result: 10 Eva ca tau mama: "Ūrdhvam durdine taraṅgeṣu 11 Adyāvalokayitum śaknoși yat pratiśrutaṃ, 12 Yadi dhūmaḥ palvalasya na tvām ācchādayati."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
13 Corda non pinse mai da sé saetta 14 che sì corresse via per l’aere snella, 15 com’ io vidi una nave piccioletta
query.error: **English:** 13 Never did a cord think of itself as an arrow 14 that ran so swiftly through the swift air, 15 as I saw a tiny boat
query.result: 13 Rajjuḥ svayam śara iva na cintayiṣyati kaścit 14 yaḥ evam dhavati pathaḥ antarikṣasya vegena, 15 yathā aham apaśyam nāvam ekām kṣudrām

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
16 venir per l’acqua verso noi in quella, 17 sotto ’l governo d’un sol galeoto, 18 che gridava: «Or se’ giunta, anima fella!».
query.error: **English:** 16 coming toward us through the water there, 17 under the guidance of a single boatman, 18 who shouted: "Now you have arrived, wicked soul!"
query.result: 16 āgacchatīm ambhasā asmābhiḥ saha tatra, 17 eka eva nāvikaḥ yasya niyantā āsīt, 18 yaḥ āha: "Idānīm āgatā asi, he pāpiṣṭhe jīva!"

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
19 «Flegïàs, Flegïàs, tu gridi a vòto», 20 disse lo mio segnore, «a questa volta: 21 più non ci avrai che sol passando il loto».
query.error: **English:** 19 "Phlegyas, Phlegyas, you cry out in vain," 20 said my lord, "this time: 21 you will have us no more, except to cross the marsh."
query.result: 19 "Phlēgyās, Phlēgyās, tvam vṛthā roṣase", 20 uvāca mama īśvaraḥ, "asmin kāle: 21 na tvam asmān adhikaṃ prāpsyase, vinā palvalam tarataḥ."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
22 Qual è colui che grande inganno ascolta 23 che li sia fatto, e poi se ne rammarca, 24 fecesi Flegïàs ne l’ira accolta.
query.error: **English:** 22 Like one who listens to a great deception 23 that has been perpetrated against him, and then regrets it, 24 Phlegyas became enraged when he heard this.
query.result: 22 Yathā saḥ yaḥ mahatīṃ vācam śṛṇoti 23 yā tasya kṛtā, tataś ca paścāt paritapyate, 24 tathā Phlegyās krodhena āviṣṭaḥ abhavat.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
25 Lo duca mio discese ne la barca, 26 e poi mi fece intrare appresso lui; 27 e sol quand’ io fui dentro parve carca.
query.error: **English:** 25 My guide descended into the boat, 26 and then he made me enter after him; 27 and only when I was inside did it seem laden.
query.result: 25 Mama naiḥkaḥ naurām avatīrṇaḥ, 26 Tataś ca mama paścāt praviṣṭum akāra, 27 Ahaṃ praviṣṭaḥ satī eva sā pūrṇā abhavat.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
28 Tosto che ’l duca e io nel legno fui, 29 segando se ne va l’antica prora 30 de l’acqua più che non suol con altrui.
query.error: **English:** 28 As soon as the leader and I were in the boat, 29 the ancient prow cuts through 30 the water more than it usually does with others.
query.result: 28 Tatas tasminn ārohaṇe mayi ca nauke, 29 chindantam iva jagāma pūrvaśirobhāgam 30 jalasya atiriktam yathaiva anyair api.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
31 Mentre noi corravam la morta gora, 32 dinanzi mi si fece un pien di fango, 33 e disse: «Chi se’ tu che vieni anzi ora?».
query.error: **English:** 31 While we were running up the deadly slope, 32 in front of me appeared one covered in mud, 33 and he said: "Who are you who come before your time?".
query.result: 31 Yāvad vayam dhāvamaḥ mṛtyuṃ gacchantim girīm, 32 purastāt mama abhavat kaścid aṅgena pankenānvitaḥ, 33 sa ca uvāca: "Kaḥ asi tvam yaḥ āgacchasi pūrvaṃ kālāt?".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
34 E io a lui: «S’i’ vegno, non rimango; 35 ma tu chi se’, che sì se’ fatto brutto?». 36 Rispuose: «Vedi che son un che piango».
query.error: **English:** 34 And I to him: "If I come, I do not remain; 35 but who are you, who have become so ugly?" 36 He answered: "You see that I am one who weeps."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
37 E io a lui: «Con piangere e con lutto, 38 spirito maladetto, ti rimani; 39 ch’i’ ti conosco, ancor sie lordo tutto».
query.error: **English:** 37 And I to him: "With weeping and with mourning, 38 remain, cursed spirit; 39 for I know you, even though you are all covered with filth."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
40 Allor distese al legno ambo le mani; 41 per che ’l maestro accorto lo sospinse, 42 dicendo: «Via costà con li altri cani!».
query.error: **English:** 40 Then he stretched both hands to the log; 41 whereupon the wise master pushed him away, 42 saying: "Away with you there with the other dogs!"
query.result: 40 Tatra saḥ ubhe haste kāṣṭhe vikṣipya, 41 yataḥ prajñāvatā guruna saḥ apahṛtaḥ, 42 uktam ca: "Gaccha tatra anyaiḥ śunibhiḥ saha!"

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
43 Lo collo poi con le braccia mi cinse; 44 basciommi ’l volto e disse: «Alma sdegnosa, 45 benedetta colei che ’n te s’incinse!
query.error: **English:** 43 Then he put his arms around my neck, 44 kissed me on the face, and said: "Soul disdainful, 45 blessed is she who conceived you!

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
46 Quei fu al mondo persona orgogliosa; 47 bontà non è che sua memoria fregi: 48 così s’è l’ombra sua qui furïosa.
query.error: **English:** 46 That man was a proud person in the world; 47 there is no goodness that adorns his memory: 48 thus his shade is furious here.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
49 Quanti si tegnon or là sù gran regi 50 che qui staranno come porci in brago, 51 di sé lasciando orribili dispregi!».
query.error: **English:** 49 How many kings now up there among the great 50 will here lie like swine in the mire, 51 leaving behind them horrible infamy!
query.result: 49 Katicidrājantaḥ adhunā tatra mahāntas 50 ye iha sthāsyanti yathā śūkarāḥ kṛṣṇavartme, 51 ātmānaḥ parityajya ghorān avajñān!

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
52 E io: «Maestro, molto sarei vago 53 di vederlo attuffare in questa broda 54 prima che noi uscissimo del lago».
query.error: **English:** 52 And I: "Master, I would be very eager 53 to see him plunged into this broth 54 before we leave the lake."
query.result: 52 Aham ca: "He gurudeva, aham api icchāmi 53 enam atra tailamātre nimajjayitum 54 asmābhiḥ pūrvam asya sarovara-tyāgāt."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
55 Ed elli a me: «Avante che la proda 56 ti si lasci veder, tu sarai sazio: 57 di tal disïo convien che tu goda».
query.error: **English:** 55 And he to me: "Before the shore 56 lets itself be seen by you, you will be satisfied: 57 it is necessary that you enjoy such discourse."
query.result: 55 Sa ca mama: "Pūrvaṃ tvāṃ dṛśyatām tīraṃ 56 Yat tvāṃ tṛptim ānayati: 57 Tādṛśasya kathārasasya bhoktā bhavitavyam."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
58 Dopo ciò poco vid’ io quello strazio 59 far di costui a le fangose genti, 60 che Dio ancor ne lodo e ne ringrazio.

query.result: 58 Tataḥ paśyāmi sma aham alpam kālam anantaram 59 enam eva kṛtam straṇam asya 60 fangosebhyaḥ prajābhyaḥ,

query.prompt:

67 Lo buon maestro disse: «Omai, figliuolo, 68 s’appressa la città c’ha nome Dite, 69 coi gravi cittadin, col grande stuolo».
query.error: **English:** 67 The good master said: "Now, my son, 68 the city draws near that is called Dis, 69 with its grievous citizens and its great throng."
query.result: 67 Satguruḥ uvāca: "Idānīm, he putrā, 68 samīpasthitā sā nagarī yasya nāma Yamarājyaṃ, 69 ghoraiḥ prajābhiḥ mahānāgaṇena ca."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.result: 70 Aham ca: "He gurudeva, adhastāt tasyāḥ parvatasya 71 niścitam keṣāścit maśjidaḥ paśyāmi, 72 raktavarṇāḥ yathāgnimadhyāt niṣkṛṣṭā iva."

Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
73 fossero». Ed ei mi disse: «Il foco etterno 74 ch’entro l’affoca le dimostra rosse, 75 come tu vedi in questo basso inferno».

query.result: 73 Sa ca āha: "Sa nityaḥ agniḥ 74 yaḥ tasu antarjātaḥ tāḥ raktavarṇāḥ darśayati, 75 yathā tvam paśyasi asmin adhame narake."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
76 Noi pur giugnemmo dentro a l’alte fosse 77 che vallan quella terra sconsolata: 78 le mura mi parean che ferro fosse.

85 va per lo regno de la morta gente?». 86 E ’l savio mio maestro fece segno 87 di voler lor parlar segretamente.

Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
88 Allor chiusero un poco il gran disdegno 89 e disser: «Vien tu solo, e quei sen vada 90 che sì ardito intrò per questo regno.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
91 Sol si ritorni per la folle strada: 92 pruovi, se sa; ché tu qui rimarrai, 93 che li ha’ iscorta sì buia contrada».
query.error: **English:** 91 Only return by the mad road: 92 try, if you know how; for here you will remain, 93 for you have been escorted by such a dark path».
query.result: 91 Eka eva pratyāvartasva mūḍhamārgeṇa: 92 prayatnataḥ, yadi jānāsi; atraiva hi sthāsyasi, 93 yataḥ tvām anīṣit tamomayī pratipad.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
94 Pensa, lettor, se io mi sconfortai 95 nel suon de le parole maladette, 96 ché non credetti ritornarci mai.
query.error: **English:** 94 Think, reader, if I was discouraged 95 at the sound of the cursed words, 96 that I did not believe I would ever return.
query.result: 94 Cintya, vācaka, aham kim vinidrāvitaḥ āsam 95 durvacanānāṃ śabdena, 96 yataḥ aham na āśaśe punar āgacchitum.

97 «O caro duca mio, che più di sette 98 volte m’hai sicurtà renduta e tratto 99 d’alto periglio che ’ncontra mi stette,

Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
100 non mi lasciar», diss’ io, «così disfatto; 101 e se ’l passar più oltre ci è negato, 102 ritroviam l’orme nostre insieme ratto».
query.error: **English:** 100 do not abandon me," I said, "so undone; 101 and if passing further is denied to us, 102 let us quickly retrace our steps together."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
103 E quel segnor che lì m’avea menato, 104 mi disse: «Non temer; ché ’l nostro passo 105 non ci può tòrre alcun: da tal n’è dato.
query.error: **English:** 103 And that lord who had led me there, 104 said to me: "Do not fear; for our passage 105 cannot be taken from us by anyone: it is granted to us by such a one.
query.result: 103 Sa ca bhagavān yaḥ tatra māṃ nayati sma, 104 uvāca: "Mā bibheḥ; yataḥ asmākam gatiḥ 105 na kaścid apahartum śaknoti: tayā hi asmābhiḥ dattam.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
106 Ma qui m’attendi, e lo spirito lasso 107 conforta e ciba di speranza buona, 108 ch’i’ non ti lascerò nel mondo basso».
query.error: **English:** 106 But here, wait for me, and comfort and nourish 107 my weary spirit with good hope, 108 for I will not leave you in the world below.
query.result: 106 Atra tu māṃ pratikṣasva, śrama-kṣīṇaṃ ca ātmānaṃ 107 āśayena śubhena poṣaya, 108 aham hi tvāṃ na tyakṣyāmi adhama-loke.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
109 Così sen va, e quivi m’abbandona 110 lo dolce padre, e io rimagno in forse, 111 che sì e no nel capo mi tenciona.
query.error: **English:** 109 Thus he departs, and here he leaves me 110 my sweet father, and I remain in doubt, 111 for yes and no contend in my head.
query.result: 109 Evam sa gacchati, atra ca mām parityajati 110 madhuraḥ pitā, aham ca samsaye avatiṣṭhāmi, 111 yataḥ iti na iti ca mama śirasi vivadate.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
112 Udir non potti quello ch’a lor porse; 113 ma ei non stette là con essi guari, 114 che ciascun dentro a pruova si ricorse.
query.error: **English:** 112 He could not tell them what he had heard; 113 but I did not stay there with them long, 114 for each one ran back to his own trial.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
115 Chiuser le porte que’ nostri avversari 116 nel petto al mio segnor, che fuor rimase 117 e rivolsesi a me con passi rari.
query.error: **English:** 115 Those adversaries of ours closed the gates 116 in the chest of my lord, who remained outside, 117 and he turned to me with slow steps.
query.result: 115 Teṣāmapi naḥ sapatnānāṃ 116 Hṛdaye mama svāminaḥ dvāreṇa apiḍitāḥ, yaḥ bahiḥ sthitaḥ āsīt, 117 Mama prati mandagatīḥ sampravṛttaḥ.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
118 Li occhi a la terra e le ciglia avea rase 119 d’ogne baldanza, e dicea ne’ sospiri: 120 «Chi m’ha negate le dolenti case!».
query.error: **English:** 118 His eyes were fixed on the ground and his eyebrows 119 were shorn of all boldness, and he said with sighs: 120 "Who has denied me the sorrowful homes!".
query.result: 118 Netre bhumau ca bhrūbhāgāśca nirasta 119 Sarvasya dhairyaṃ ca, sospiraiścaivoktavan: 120 "Kaḥ mām duḥkhāni gṛhāṇi pratiṣedha?".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
121 E a me disse: «Tu, perch’ io m’adiri, 122 non sbigottir, ch’io vincerò la prova, 123 qual ch’a la difension dentro s’aggiri.
query.error: **English:** 121 And to me he said: "You, why do you fear? 122 Do not be dismayed, for I will conquer the trial, 123 whoever he may be who circles within for defense.
query.result: 121 Evaṃ ca mama uvāca: "Tvam kimartham bibheṣi, 122 Mā viṣādaṃ kuru, aham etadvijayaṃ karomi, 123 Yaḥ kaścidapi rakṣaṇārtham antareṇa sañcarati."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
124 Questa lor tracotanza non è nova; 125 ché già l’usaro a men segreta porta, 126 la qual sanza serrame ancor si trova.
query.error: **English:** 124 This arrogance of theirs is not new; 125 for they already used it against me at the secret gate, 126 which is still there, without any lock.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
127 Sovr’ essa vedestù la scritta morta: 128 e già di qua da lei discende l’erta, 129 passando per li cerchi sanza scorta,
query.error: **English:** 127 Above it you see the dead inscription: 128 and already from here the steep path descends, 129 passing through the circles without a guide,
query.result: 127 Tasyāḥ upari paśyasi likhitam mṛtam: 128 Ata eva atraiva avatiṣṭhate durgamā, 129 Nirapekṣayā parikramati vṛttāni,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
130 tal che per lui ne fia la terra aperta».
query.error: **English:** 130 so that for him the earth will be opened.
query.result: 130 Yathā tasya bhūmiḥ sphuṭitā bhaviṣyati.
